reference: Barlow, E.R. and I.T. Wender, Foreign Investment and Taxation, (Englewood Cliffs, N.J.: Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1955).
Bradford, David F., The Incidence and Allocation Effects of a Tax on Corporate Distributions, Journal of Public Economics, Vol. 15, No. 1, (February 1981), pp. 1-22.
Gilman, Martin G., Exchange Rate Illusion and the Financing of Foreign Direct Investment, (unpublished Ph.D. thesis, London School of Economics, 1980).
Goldsbrough, David, The Role of Foreign Direct Investment in the External Adjustment Process, IMF Staff Papers, Vol. 26, No. 4, (December 1979), pp. 725-754.
Hartman, David G., The Effects of Taxing Foreign Investment Income, Journal of Public Economics, Vol. 13, No. 2, (April 1980), pp. 213-230.
Horst, Thomas, American Taxation of Multinational Firms, The American Economic Review, Vol. 67, No. 3, (June 1977), pp. 376-389.
King, Mervyn, Public Policy and the Corporation, (London: Chapman and Hall, 1977).
Kopits, George F., Dividend Remittance Behavior Within the International Firm: A Cross-Country Analysis, Review of Economics and Statistics, Vol. 54 (August 1972), pp. 339-42.
Krause, Lawrence B., and Kenneth W. Dam, Federal Tax Treatment of Foreign Income, (Washington, D.C.: The Brookings Institution, 1964).
Nusgrave, Peggy B., United States Taxation of Foreign Investment Income: Issues and Arguments, (Cambridge: Harvard Law School, 1969).
Robbins, Sidney M. and Robert B. Stobaugh, Money in the Multinational Enterprise, (New York: Basic Books, 1973).
U.S. Department of the Treasury, Internal Revenue Service, U.S. Corporations and Their Controlled Foreign Corporations, 1979.
